tool_description: This API helps to query for residential, commercial listing both for sale and for rent from across Canada to create a real estate site/application such as realtor.ca
title: Realty in CA

api_list.name: locations/v2/auto-complete
api_list.description: Get auto complete suggestions by city, ward, street name or an actual address

required_parameters.name: Query
required_parameters.description: City, ward, street name, etc... or an actual address

api_list.name: keywords/list
api_list.description: List all supported tags/keywords for filtering
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realty-in-ca1.p.rapidapi.com/keywords/list"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realty-in-ca1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: locations/auto-complete
api_list.description: Get auto complete suggestions by city, ward, street name

api_list.name: agents/detail
api_list.description: Get detail information of an agent

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The value of IndividualID field returned in .../agents/list endpoint

api_list.name: agents/get-listings

required_parameters.name: OrganizationId
required_parameters.description: The value of OrganizationID field returned in .../agents/list or .../agents/detail endpoint

optional_parameters.name: RecordsPerPage
optional_parameters.description: Number items returned per request, max 50

optional_parameters.name: SortBy
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : 1-Price($)|6-Date|11-Virtual Tour|12-Open Houses|13-More Photos

api_list.name: agents/list
api_list.description: List agents with options and filters

optional_parameters.name: RecordsPerPage
optional_parameters.description: Number items returned per request, max 50

optional_parameters.name: Specialties
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : 2-Residential Property Management|4-Residential Brokerage|8-Residential Development|10-Residential Valuation|12-Residential Financing|14-Residential Leasing|16-Residential Legal|18-Residential Relocation|17-Relocation|28-2nd Home|33-Age Restricted/Active Adult Community Properties|36-Agriculture Land|9-Appraisal|3-Business Brokerage|35-Condos|5-Consulting|7-Development Land|24-Farm/Ranch|32-Golf Community Properties|25-Hospitality|21-Industrial|11-Investment|29-Luxury Homes|23-Multi-Family|22-Office|1-Property Management|26-Recreational|31-Resort Properties|20-Retail|30-Seasonal/Vacation Rentals|27-Waterfront Properties

api_list.name: properties/list-commercial
api_list.description: List commercial properties both for lease and for sale

optional_parameters.name: PriceMin
optional_parameters.description: Filter by min price, applied when TransactionTypeId = 2

optional_parameters.name: BuildingTypeId
optional_parameters.description: 0-No Preference|1-House|2-Duplex|3-Triplex|5-Residential Commercial Mix|6-Mobile Home|12-Special Purpose|14-Other|16-Row / Townhouse|17-Apartment|19-Fourplex|20-Garden Home|26-Modular|27-Manufactured Home/Mobile|28-Commercial Apartment|29-Manufactured Home

optional_parameters.name: PriceMax
optional_parameters.description: Filter by max price, applied when TransactionTypeId = 2

optional_parameters.name: RecordsPerPage
optional_parameters.description: Number items returned per request, max 50

optional_parameters.name: OpenHouse
optional_parameters.description: false/true (not 0/1). Need to use together with OpenHouseStartDate and OpenHouseEndDate parameters

optional_parameters.name: ZoningTypeGroupId
optional_parameters.description: 1-Agricultural|2-Commercial Mixed|3-Commercial Office|4-Commercial Retail|5-Industrial|6-Industrial-Heavy|7-Industrial-Light|8-Industrial-Medium|9-Institutional|10-Other|11-Recreational|12-Residential-High Density|13-Residential-Low Density|14-Residential - Medium Density

optional_parameters.name: Keywords
optional_parameters.description: Get suitable values from â¦/keywords/list endpoint, separated by comma for multiple keywords, Ex : Inlaw suite,Income suite

api_list.name: properties/list-by-mls
api_list.description: List properties by listing ID or MLS number

api_list.name: properties/detail
api_list.description: Get details information of specific property

required_parameters.name: PropertyID
required_parameters.description: The value of Id field from .../list-commercial or .../list-residential endpoints

required_parameters.name: ReferenceNumber
required_parameters.description: The value of MlsNumber field from .../list-commercial or .../list-residential endpoints

api_list.name: properties/list-residential
api_list.description: List residential properties both for rent and for sale

optional_parameters.name: ZoningTypeGroupId
optional_parameters.description: 1-Agricultural|2-Commercial Mixed|3-Commercial Office|4-Commercial Retail|5-Industrial|6-Industrial-Heavy|7-Industrial-Light|8-Industrial-Medium|9-Institutional|10-Other|11-Recreational|12-Residential-High Density|13-Residential-Low Density|14-Residential - Medium Density

optional_parameters.name: RecordsPerPage
optional_parameters.description: Number items returned per request, max 50

optional_parameters.name: ParkingTypeId
optional_parameters.description: 1-Attached garage|2-Integrated garage|3-Detached garage|4-Garage|5-Carport|6-Underground|7-Indoor|8-Open|9-Covered|10-Parking pad|11-Paved Yard|35-Boat House|36-Concrete|37-Heated Garage

optional_parameters.name: Keywords
optional_parameters.description: Get suitable values from â¦/keywords/list endpoint, separated by comma for multiple keywords, Ex : Inlaw suite,Income suite

optional_parameters.name: PriceMax
optional_parameters.description: Filter by max price, applied when TransactionTypeId = 2

optional_parameters.name: PriceMin
optional_parameters.description: Filter by min price, applied when TransactionTypeId = 2

optional_parameters.name: OpenHouse
optional_parameters.description: false/true (not 0/1). Need to use together with OpenHouseStartDate and OpenHouseEndDate parameters

optional_parameters.name: RentMax
optional_parameters.description: Filter by max price, applied when TransactionTypeId = 3

optional_parameters.name: BuildingTypeId
optional_parameters.description: 0-No Preference|1-House|2-Duplex|3-Triplex|5-Residential Commercial Mix|6-Mobile Home|12-Special Purpose|14-Other|16-Row / Townhouse|17-Apartment|19-Fourplex|20-Garden Home|26-Modular|27-Manufactured Home/Mobile|28-Commercial Apartment|29-Manufactured Home

optional_parameters.name: RentMin
optional_parameters.description: Filter by min price, applied when TransactionTypeId = 3

api_list.name: properties/get-statistics
api_list.description: Get statistic information of surround area by GEO location
